author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A luscious way to serve melted cheese
name: Authentic Swiss Fondue Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large garlic clove, cut in half
1 large day-old baguette, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the cut side of the garlic clove inside the fondue pot and discard the garlic. Add the wine and lemon juice to the pot and bring it to a boil on the stove over medium heat. Reduce the heat to low. Toss the Gruyère and Emmental cheese in a bowl with the cornstarch. One handful at a time, stir the cheese into the wine, mixing until the cheese melt before adding more.
Cook, stirring constantly, until the fondue just comes to a simmer. Stir in the kirsch, and season with pepper.
If the fondue is too thin, add more cheese or stir in cornstarch dissolved in wine. If too thick, stir in a little warmed white wine.
To serve, transfer the pot to its stand on the table. Spear the bread cubes onto fondue forks and dunk into the cheese.
